dare: End every sentence you say with 'meow' until your next turn.
Imitate a celebrity until someone guesses who it is.
Act like a chicken until your next turn!
Confess your feelings to your crush.
Voice note: Hold your breath for 30 seconds.
Do a backbend (or try!) for one minute.
Hold a plank position for one minute.
Read aloud the last message you sent to your crush.
Call a random friend and sing 'Happy Birthday' to them.
Show us your best dance moves!
Tell your best friend 'I Love You' out loud.
Repeat everything the person next to you says until your next turn.
